channel.title: Project Apolo [First Major Thing]
channel.description:
I've been working on a base for quite some time. It's 382kb. I'm sorry I wasn't able to keep my goal of 250kb, but I wanted to add My Own Castle War's and Clan War's. Since they are so finely done, together they will take up about 350kb.
Completion:
Clan Wars- 17%
Castle Wars- 55%
My current project Is castle wars. I've finished so much, but I want to match RuneScape In Development of cW, That Is why I say I'm only done by 55% because there is so much more to add/code to match RuneScape Development
cW Features:
Wait Timers- 100%
Saradomin/Zamrock Portal- 100%
Flag Taking- 100%
Working Potions/Barracades- 100%
Dungeon run through's- 75%
Stepping stones- 80%
Taking flag from other player- 99.9% (gotta find glitch)
I will post picture's When I get Idea's of the Development Plans. Ideas?

item.title: Project Apolo [First Major Thing]

item.description:
@rofllewisrofl wrote:

Yeah, Mine’s the best I’ve seen on any server, and I still think It’s only 55%.

item.title: Project Apolo [First Major Thing]
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

[quote=“nerdboyxx, post:3, topic:269506”]Yeah, A server I played had a GodWars training area, but it was buggy as hell and really annoying (you could barely see anything because the camera was forced to stay up in the air) but if you made a stable one that would be nice.

I have 100 percent castle wars on mine, my clan wars will be wilderness-based (you know the old-style clan wars kinda thing) unless there is a major demand for the one jagex developed, and I want a GodWars

Nice developments though, could you add pictures?[/quote]
I’m pretty sure you don’t have 100% castle wars.

Read full topic
